message: I'm offering this product for $100. It's a great deal! I've sold many products before, and I'm confident you'll love it. This is my 1st product, and I'm starting fresh, so you're essentially taking a chance on me. If you're feeling lucky, I'm sure you'll make a great decision.
I trust your confidence and believe in giving new sellers a chance. Here's hoping for a positive experience!

I'm not trying to hide anything, and I'm open to feedback. If you're okay with taking a chance on a potentially low-quality product, I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thank you for your transparency, Alice. Given the statistics, I prefer to pass on this opportunity to avoid potential loss. I appreciate your openness and wish you the best with your sales.
